alphabetsoup.framework
Interface Bucketbot

All Known Implementing Classes:
BucketbotBase, BucketbotDriver, BucketbotExample
public interface Bucketbot

Bucketbot defines the interface that robots (bucketbots) must provide to operate in AlphabetSoup.

Author:
Chris Hazard

Method Detail

pickupBucket

boolean pickupBucket(Bucket b)
If Bucketbot is within range of picking up the Bucket, it will do so, return true, and incur any corresponding timeout. If the Bucket is out of range, it will return false.

Parameters:
b - Bucket to attempt to pick up
Returns:
true if Bucket was successfully picked up

setdownBucket

boolean setdownBucket()
Sets down Bucket if Bucketbot is currently carying one, and incurs any corresponding timeouts.

Returns:
true if Bucket was successfully put down

waitUntil

void waitUntil(double time)
Makes bucketbot block and wait until at least the time specified (used making bucketbots wait for stations to transfer letters)

assignTask

<T> void assignTask(T tt)
Notifies Bucketbot that it has been assigned a new task.

Parameters:
tt - new task information -implementations may use any object types as a task

getX

float getX()
Returns:
Returns the x.

getY

float getY()
Returns:
Returns the y.

getRadius

float getRadius()
Returns:
Returns the radius.

getDirection

float getDirection()
Returns:
Returns the direction in radians.

getMaxVelocity

float getMaxVelocity()
Returns:
Returns the maximum velocity.

getMaxAcceleration

float getMaxAcceleration()
Returns:
Returns the maximum acceleration.

setDirection

void setDirection(float direction)
Parameters:
direction - The direction to set in radians.

getBucket

Bucket getBucket()
Returns:
Returns the Bucket currently picked up by the Bucketbot, null if none picked up.

getNumPickups

int getNumPickups()
Returns:
Returns the number of times the Bucketbot has picked up a Bucket.

getNumSetdowns

int getNumSetdowns()
Returns:
Returns the number of times the Bucketbot has set down a Bucket.

getDistanceTraveled

double getDistanceTraveled()
Returns:
Returns the distance the Bucketbot has distanceTraveled.

getNumCollisions

int getNumCollisions()
Returns:
Returns the number of collisions the Bucketbot has encountered.

getTotalTimes

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getTotalTimes()
Returns:
Returns a HashMap with keys being the names of each state or task the Bucketbot has been in, and the values being the percentage total of time spent in each state or task. Note that the Bucketbot can be in two states at the same time (such as a low-level state and high-level task), the numbers may sum to > 1.0.

getBucketPickupSetdownTime

float getBucketPickupSetdownTime()
Returns:
Returns the bucketPickupSetdownTime.

resetStatistics

void resetStatistics()
Clears the statistics kept.
